title: Support ticket sent 5-6 without replay
body: My brother went on my account and bought super galaxy rumble and not even a hour after he did this I sent in a request for this. They haven't replaced any help :/

replies.body: I looked into this for you and confirmed that your ticket was successfully received and in queue to be reviewed by our account crew.  Just as a heads up, it's important not to reply to the ticket until you receive a reply, otherwise you will drop back to the bottom of the queue.  We'll respond as soon as we can!
Thought I made a mistake or somthing
